pr_title: DBZ-1995 returned content about pass-through properties for MySQL connector

timeline.message: DBZ-1995 returned content about pass-through properties for MySQL connector

DBZ-1995 Created headings for pass-through properties, and for pass-through properties for db drivers

timeline.bodyText: @TovaCohen Why is it we needed this one, given it's exactly the same as the one above?
timeline.author: gunnarmorling

replies.bodyText: Ok, I've logged https://issues.redhat.com/browse/DBZ-2223 for potentially removing this again. For now, we're merging this PR as is in order to move forward and it shouldn't make a difference in terms of the actual rendered page.
replies.author: gunnarmorling

replies.bodyText:
I thought I needed both because the doc is in separate files. But I was wrong.
I can remove this attribute, but I also need to update the file that refers to it. I'll create a separate commit and PR for that now.
replies.author: TovaCohen
